/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of beige and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, adding a vibrant touch to the otherwise monochrome palette of the buildings. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
